revised_title: Numerical Methods for Deflexion of Beams under Transverse Loading
tldr: The authors present two numerical methods for solving engineering problems related to the deflexion of beams under transverse loading. The first method is a straightforward application of numerical integration, while the second method is a novel application of the relaxation method. Both methods provide accurate results for practical purposes and can be used to solve various problems in beam deflection and structural analysis.
